biography: Naomi is an architect of digital spaces that overlay our physical world. As a Spatial Computing Developer, she builds the software that powers augmented reality and mixed reality experiences, anchoring digital information and interactive objects in real-world environments. She is a master of 3D geometry, computer vision, and user interaction in physical space. Her work aims to erase the boundary between the screen and the world.
